summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 2813 lux) and cloud levels (up 239 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), feels like temperature (up 3.7°C), dew point temperature (up 4.2°C), and outside temperature (up 4.7°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, air moisture should feel ok and mostly calm with light air movement. Drizzle or light rain possible, occasional overcast conditions, and periods of sunshine are expected. Similar weather conditions should remain.
